lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Someone want to handle our other cool--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's not on us yet. Oh look, now you can see us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't I go, and then you can go. Hey, you guys. I just want to make sure all of you are aware-- this is going to be so awkward-- I want to make sure you're all aware of a Kickstarter that's out there that is put up by a good friend of mine named Joe Madureira. Now if you don't know who Joe is, he is a comic book rock god and a game developer. When I was a teenager, he made a comic book called Battle Chasers. Look, here's mine. From when I was 16, Joe. I fell in love with it. Nobody does art like Joe Mad does, and I've followed his art for years and years. Even when I fell out of comic books, I was checking in with Hellboy and I was checking in with Joe Mad. And then, years later, I got cast in a game called Darksiders as one of the Horsemen of the Apocalypse. I played War, and I walked into the room and Joe Mad was in the fucking room, and then we became friends. So that game was amazing. Darksiders is a beautiful game. It just reeked of Joe's art style and now he has formed another company called Airship Syndicate and they have a Kickstarter up. They are making a game called Battle Chasers. Oh shoot! I didn't put the thing that comes-- oh, Nightwar! Battle Chasers: Nightwar. They've already hit their goal, but there are stretch goals. They are making an RPG, sort of in the ilk of JRPGs, like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. And it's just going to be bathed in the glory of Joe Mad's amazing art style. So they've hit their goal, but the bigger the budget, the better the game is going to be. I backed it already. And you guys should at least go check it out. A lot of love for Joe Mad.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, me too. I'm on the same end. I knew Joe Mad through meeting Liam for a while, and later realizing that this guy I knew as an amazing voice director and an amazing producer has inked some of my favorite issues of Excalibur, and I crapped my pants. I have four of yours, Joe, in my box right now at home. He's an amazing guy and awesome thing to back. Check it out, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And one, the main character from Battle Chasers kind of looks like Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She does! I thought that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's sweet. Wunderbar!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got something. Next weekend, September 26 and 27, I'm going to be at a con! In Anchorage, Alaska.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That means "convention".

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means moose. I'm so excited. Senshi Con in Anchorage. I'll be there. I know we at least have, like, three fans at the very least in Alaska. Come on by. I'd love to see you. It'll be awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. Speaking of conventions, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, drop it like it's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's trainable, if it's flyable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you steal a horse, steal a horse and ride it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want to ride a bear there, I wouldn't judge you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what weekend is New York Comic Con?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight, nine, ten, 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: October 8th, 9th, 10th and 11th. So you've got three weeks to prepare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're waiting to see what's going on Sunday weekend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saturday is for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With more of us than are even here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring your swag. Bring your friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we were all there, just not all at one point at one time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we were missing Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The unicorn appears.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to get a hot dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orion's going to get a hot dog. Awesome. Any other announcements? Or did you have something, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I was just so excited about New York Comic Con, I wanted to be a part of that announcement.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would like to announce that I feel pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm terrified, personally, but--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know, but maybe that's why I feel so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were right. It is awful.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't have to worry about me right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much pressure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we say that we have Kit here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we shouldn't tell them that we have Kit here. Let's hold that back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kit Buss is not here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also have both of our artists here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kit and Wendy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kit and Wendy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kit and Wendy. Come here! But come here!

lines.name: RYAN
lines.text: There's a 30-second lag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll eventually have them say hello to everyone, but Kit Buss, our official CritRole artist who did all the original character designs, continues to produce amazing art for this show, is here visiting Los Angeles for the next week. So she's here on the set and we'll drag her out in front of the camera and embarrass her shortly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been curious precisely how long the lag is, because--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's about 30 seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We learned when we killed the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. (muffled yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just time that. Time that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess also an announcement for all you League players out there: awesome character just got announced called Kindred. Kind of a two-part thing. That wolf that's the part of Kindred sounds pretty cool so you should play it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heard that. It's subtle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Real subtle. It's a good one. I think that's it, isn't it? I think we're good on announcements, and we can start.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we have, do we have an address? Address?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the PO Box?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's up. Yeah, he's got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's up and in the chat?

lines.name: RYAN
lines.text: The mods are posting it in the chat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our nefarious Scanlan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. Were you just talking about me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, that's crazy. I was just talking about me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As was the website, because your interview went up today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right. I saw. Some of that I had my ghostwriter write for me. I have a biographer and a ghostwriter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a ghostwriter on retainer that we can also use?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Well, fantastic. Do you have any announcements you want to make, Sam, or shall we jump in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Just that I don't have any dice but I can use Orion's and they're going to be awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have so many dice. Take this giant bag and just fish some out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Bag of Disagreeable Dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, let him find them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. All right, so to give you guys a little heads-up of what has recently transpired in the story. The party, after completing their business in the city of Vasselheim, on the far-off northwest continent. Grog, of course, having an epic battle in the Crucible fight pit against Kern, reclaiming his honor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I am the champion, my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike left back there to finish up the renovation of the temple of Sarenrae that was discovered. The rest of the party moved on back to Emon, the rest of their business complete. Within Emon, they returned to Greyskull Keep, where they encountered a fan, apparently, of Vox Machina, that had been camping for two weeks outside, who was promptly bludgeoned in the temple by Vax to teach him a lesson. Brought back from the brink, and taught that hard lesson-- that this is a dangerous field-- managed to seemingly reach out and touch the heart of this young, intrepid, wannabe adventurer to possibly try and better himself before he throws himself into danger's way. And he ran off to train harder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dagger, dagger, hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Upon returning to the keep, notice was sent off to one of the other members of the Council of Tal'Dorei, Seeker Asum, who is the halfling head of whispers and all sorts of subterfuge across the countryside, who came to you notifying you that within a week's time, the Briarwoods, Lord and Lady Briarwood, are supposed to be arriving here within Emon for a feast to discuss building a bridge and a more political joining between Emon, the Tal'Dorei royal family, and these up-and-coming lords and ladies, who have a very dark history with Percy's character. You've been asked to join as part of this feast as you previously requested with sovereign Tal'Dorei, that should anything involved the Briarwoods that you be included. You have a week to figure out what you want to do in advance of that. And that is where we left off.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What time of the day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laina looks about the rest of you and goes, "By the way, we've been working here for about six "weeks on the pay of four. We're coming close to our next pay scheme, and you tend to leave "often and for extended periods of time. We would also like to be paid, if possible."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most definitely, dear. Yes. We are definitely going to pay you. Does anybody remember how much we are supposed to pay them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pardon, what is the total of the staff's payment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She thinks to herself for a moment, at which point you see Erwen, the elderly servant in the back says, "Actually, you had previously said it was both of our services was 50 gold each for the "month. And if I recall, the other mercenaries or guardians that you've hired to watch the walls of "the keep were at a discussed 100 gold for the month's wages. Each."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And how many of those guys do we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You currently have five on your payroll, yes. 600 gold pieces total per month for the "services for everyone keeping your keep."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, I will front this from my personal funds for this month. Just because we don't have enough in the party funds to cover that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have 600 gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do not!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's our treasurer?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am, but you bitches keep spending money!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go halfsies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Halfsies? Lovely. Twinsies will pay halfsies. Here you go! 300 for each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They'll be very happy to not have to walk away. "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, don't worry, you will always be paid from Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Erwen steps in. "And by the way, if you do intend to leave for an extended period of time "again, I would recommend perhaps paying that in advance. There was a bit of unrest last time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we pay another month?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet. Not just yet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll pay him in advance right now, just to get it out of the way. 600, out of here, phew, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, sire! I shall disseminate this amongst the others."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Traditionally, the head of the house does dispense out the stipends anyway. That would be appropriate. I'm not even in the room, am I? Never mind! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're down in the workshop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go find Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, we should all go find Percy. We should all talk to Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you kindly, Tiberius. Thank you." And he wanders off and begins counting out change into a smaller purse.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: When they start to go, I'd like to go to the temple with the sigils and talk to the guy who runs the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean the Lyceum?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the Alabaster Lyceum.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, because I learned something new this week and I was like, I'm dumb. But that's where I would like to head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually has a working forge, with anvil and various blacksmithing tools. And as you guys come down, the heat is already blasting from it, and you can see Percy madly diving into work of some kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing, Percy? You making more mousetraps? Guess not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on a few projects that have been rolling around in my head for quite some time now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (whispers) Don't forget the bolt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bolt is on the list, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quite the worker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a lot to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Darling...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many of you are down here right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're all here. I'm moving through his stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I let Trinket forage around the courtyard, so he's not down here at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we need a little history lesson here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, don't touch that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not? But it moves!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't touch anything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Matthew, I took some fine meats before I left and I'm feeding them to Lockheed along the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're delicious. Comfort food crafted by the finest of cooks in Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you know, we were talking about it-- not that we were talking about you or anything, behind your back or anything-- but we never really found out why you were in that prison cell when we found you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've never questioned it before. We've never wanted to make you uncomfortable. But we're about to walk into a party, and I feel like we need a bit of a history lesson.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh. I know you're right. (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we guess? Was it public nudity?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A bit. I've never had to say this out loud before. I've never actually had this discussion with anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay. It gets better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get an inspiration die for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I chased her. I chased her down. It took a year, and I had my gun, and I discovered where she was and where she was working on some ruins, and I approached her. I never even saw her face. Her guards captured me, beat me up. Didn't even bother taking my things. They just threw me in that dungeon. I never even got close enough to see her face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know her name, but you've never seen her before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw her when she was interrogating me in my home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so you could recognize her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you get away when they-- with the rest of your family?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably nothing reasonable. Nothing good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You witnessed none of these deaths?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw bodies of a few of them. It's all a bit shady. It's all a bit of a blur.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many years ago was this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Four now. Five now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you know that they murdered your family, how are they still part of society?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. (sighs) I could have gone home. I could have gone home at any point, at this point. I'm scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did they take over Whitestone? Are they still there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I discovered approximately a week ago that they're still at Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will they recognize you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And these pricks are in good standing with the council?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I don't know what to do. I'm preparing for anything. When I got thrown into that dungeon, I came to the realization that maybe I wasn't doing this the right way. I wasn't being responsible, and I prayed to whatever it is I pray to that maybe I would have a sign of what I should be doing, and then there you were. I've been trusting that Vox Machina will take me where I need to go, and maybe what I need to do is confront this, but I don't know what this is, and I'm terrified.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the remains of your family, were they killed by the sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. There was an interrogation. Dr. Ripley was asking questions. I assumed, for all these years, that that's what became of my family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was she asking questions about? What did they want? Was it just a political coup?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Asking questions about the castle, about things about the castle. It was a long time ago, and I was not equipped for torture. I don't remember much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want them dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we interrogate them first? Find out more about your family?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or just skip ahead to the dead part?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put down my gun, and I turn the barrel, and of the six barrels, five of them have names, and Lord and Lady Briarwood are two of those names. Dr. Ripley is another.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are the other ones?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sir Stonefell is the other, and Professor Anders is the other, and then there's one blank one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they all members of the same party? They travel with the Briarwoods?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was the captain of their guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Professor Anders? Who's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Professor Anders was my teacher. He was my tutor, and he was in collusion with them, and he was the one that I believe allowed them to take the castle in the night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do you remember why they were invited to Whitestone to begin with?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were traveling. They were on the road. It was my brother Julius and my sister Vesper who handled matters of court. I was studying. I didn't think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how many brothers and sisters do you have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might have six. We don't know what happened to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you saw a few bodies of family?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all very much a blur. (sighs) There's things you just forget.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, this is certainly tragic, but looking forward, what do we know of this meeting? Event? Party? What are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think we need to do some spying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, do they know Percy's among us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the thing. I don't know if they do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to get involved in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we are so involved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah, we do. You said you want them dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got your back, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, you don't really have a choice in the matter. My sister and I know a little piece of your pain. I'm not going to get into it, but there's nothing she and I can do. We can find reparations for you. We will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, is this what you want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only one way to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if we kill them, how much will you pay us? Just kidding. We ask other people that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something I do need to know. Percy. If we see them, and we're not ready to show our faces, will you be able to contain yourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And would they be able to recognize your face?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why I was planning on-- I know we have a cap of disguise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! We do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan has it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know if they would recognize me. My hair was different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Less purple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go into town, and find you a bushy mustache. It's worked for me many times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I wear one as well as you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How does that cap work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that cap is more of a hat. While wearing this hat you can use an action to cast Disguise spell. Oh. Cast a Disguise spell? Do you have to be a spellcaster to use it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not have to, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see a shiny tool. I don't know what it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach over and grab it, and it's a large set of tongs, used for gripping large, heavy pieces of metal, either for the actual forge itself, or to bend and manipulate on the workbench.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it (yawns) and put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealing from the workshop that you partially own?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are lots of cool stuff in there! What was the check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleight of hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's sleight of hand-- 17!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My passive perception is 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this could be funny, let this happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him the evil eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you the evil eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It hurts. I put it back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of curiosity, what did you pick up, what did it look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a big thing of tongs. I didn't know what it did, I just wanted it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A big thing of tongs? What would I have to roll to find out if it was covered in some basic sulfuric acid? If it was one of the things I was using for casting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah, interesting. You know your tools very well in your workshop, and yeah, the metal is scarred and pockmarked from use with the various corrosive chemicals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Stupid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well this Hat of Disguise, Percival, it requires some attunement. I don't know how capable you are with magical items.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got seven days. I can make you look like anything. I can talk to the right people and get you the right paperwork and you can be anyone and no one will know a fucking difference.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Calm down there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can forge paperwork, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, he can. He's actually the guy we go to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is that guy you meet on the corner of Sandy Alley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make us all into birds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we supposed to go meet with the council right away?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, in a week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do in the week? Prepare. Recon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can do things. How long of a ride is it to Kraghammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Kraghammer, on horseback? It's about two and a half days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solo style, if you're fast, and back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fast and back? I'd say just under two days, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about the giant eagle flies?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what if you're flying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, well, the horse is probably a little bit faster than the eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you don't have to stick to the road as an eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it'd put you there about the same pace, about two days on eagle, because you can just go straight through. I mean, you want to take the road because you know that there's a lot of dangerous things that wander the wild that are between there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think? Is it stupid to go and ride hard and try to get there and back before--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're going to get cash and come back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't all have to go. A couple of us can make a fast ride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius is working on it, I have a feeling deep down inside.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) Why would you say that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know I deduct points for metagaming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I didn't do anything!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree we should send someone for the money. I agree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All we need is a couple disguises.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but we need to do research. You barely know who the Briarwoods are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know anything about them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they're not going to recognize any of us, are they?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go do some recon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Besides, have we seen all the brothels in Emon? I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do some research, some reconnaissance while someone goes for the money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we wait? I really want the money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People get married in my family for money. I think it's perfectly reasonable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, we could all go get the money and be back in four days, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because some people need to do some work. We need to send some people off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Split the party?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully be back in time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's four days. We can each do our part. Five days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, can you-- Kiki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes? Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you and Scanlan fly to Kraghammer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. I would like to stop and talk to Gilmore first, though, before I leave. Do I have time for that? I can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our illustrious god just told us it's better to stick to the road because there's bad things--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the air? There's air traffic? I have to worry about air traffic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By air--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By air, though. Check yourself, Kiki--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, I would assume, use Polymorph as I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I use my Beast Shaping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. That's so sexy. Does that last for longer than a day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It lasts as long as I want it to last.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go up to the kitchen and look for something to eat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's in my blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can be an animal as long as you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are you going with this, Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can stay in Beast Shape for a number of hours equal to half your druid level. Five hours right now, you can transform for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So when I mean as long as I want, I mean, long enough to where I've never had to really think about it before now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, like me, flying there would not be an option. We'd have to stop, rest, walk, sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that would slow it down a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I could get ten hours, because I can use two Beast Shaping abilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's still a two days' flight--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two days is the horse, riding hard. What about an eagle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I get my druid shapes back after a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because Circle of the Moon, bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you could Beast Shape twice, rest 30 minutes, Beast Shape twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make a stop first, and then I'll run an errand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't really have a lot of money at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might have some.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I've got my personal fundsies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you leave me an earpiece so that I can keep in contact? I'm not leaving my workshop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an earpiece, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll leave you alone, Percy. To work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything else you need from us, Percy? Is there anything you need while I'm out and about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leave me an earpiece, and I'll call if I need anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, is there anything in this shop that you want in the Bag of Holding for later?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet. Thank you, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you not have an earpiece?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give him mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many minutes has it been? I'm wondering if his hands are starting to itch yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About this time, you start to get this weird tingling sensation around your fingers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they crave blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they crave some sort of an agent that will prevent the now slight burning sensation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow. Quick question. Sorry, I kept something from falling in the shop-- really quick reflexes-- it's making my bits tingle. Do you have anything for that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You haven't been scratching yourself, have you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I had that before. Not the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can try that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go over to the bucket of water and I stick my hands in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll make it worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. The slight burning sensation now has turned into a very vibrant burning white hot on the skin, and you can see bits of the skin start to peel back a little bit, beginning on the edges.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand him a small bag of powder. Now you've learned not to touch things if you don't know what they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I do with a bag of powder?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pour the powder on his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It foams up a little bit in places, but it is neutralized.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a good friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I leave now? I go to the kitchen to eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You easily get another meal mustered for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anybody want to join?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should probably tag along.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an arcane college. You make your way to the front clerk, who looks up to you, a nice young fellow, looks like he's trying to work through his credit in school through his training. He's dressed in the ceremonial robes of somebody who is a student, who is currently stuck with the job of working as a clerk. He's like, "Hi, can I help you?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, hi, if you do not remember me, I am Tiberius Stormwind, from Draconia. Moreover, Vox Machina, over at Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where have I heard that--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, we told you multiple times before. We met with you using your sigil of teleport-- it's fine. I've come here on a matter of business anyway, so that's neither here nor there. I was wondering if I may procure an address, or number as it were, for a sigil to Kraghammer. I believe the Thunderbrands would have some facility near theirs or on their own premises where their sigil could be channeled through the Circle of Teleportation spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're talking about sigils for teleportation, you would probably have to discuss "that with Gatekeeper Xanthas."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where is he? I thought that was you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I'm the clerk. I run the front of the-- follow me." And he gets up and leads you further into the structure to the central circular room, the white-marbled room that contains all the doors around, and in the center there is the Traverse Junction. This is the place you guys have stumbled into every single time you've teleported back to Emon. And there you see the elven wizard who you recently bothered naught but maybe five hours ago, who is currently setting up some sheets, comes back. "Oh. Hello, again."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Moreover, Vox Machina over at Greyskull Keep. I was wondering-- and I asked your clerk here because I thought he did what you actually do here-- if I may procure, for coin or perhaps some kind of favor of sorts, the address or number or code or whatever it is that would work for the Kraghammer sigil of my Circle of Teleportation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I get an understanding here that you're seeking access to one of our many sigil-based "rooms of transference. Those rooms are currently under very protected lock and key, approval by the "headmaster Thurmond Adalum himself."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, where is he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. It's like calling Time Warner Cable.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can you take me to him? Where is he at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glances over at the clerk, who goes, "Right this way, Mr. Stormwind." He leads you back to a long, long hallway with arched ceiling. You can see the marble itself has these carvings and sculptures of various dead-looking faces of long-passed mages that either were built or held in high esteem in the halls of this lyceum. At the very end, it opens up into a pretty well-decorated, almost over-the-top decorated office room for the headmaster himself. The interior is lined with large, large 15, 20-foot-tall bookshelves around this oval room with sliding ladders that are attached to them that slowly glide on their own, like they're on some sort of arcane-based pattern that puts them back and forth. There is a large chandelier of brightly colored orbs that sits 35, 40 feet in the air, that slowly rotates on its own that keeps this slowly fluctuating changing color of the room. And in the center there is a circular desk, and sitting there at the desk you can see is Headmaster Thurmond, who is this extremely elderly human male. Shaved face, very short, curved bald head with a little bit of hair in the back, hunched forward and is currently collecting a series of books into his arms. Looks like he's about to get up. And he turns and looks over. "Can I help you?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: ORION, SAM
lines.text: I'm Tiberius Stormwind from Draconia.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Moreover, Vox Machina over at Greyskull Keep here in Emon. We are the saviors of this town and whatnot. Anyway, that's neither here nor there. I went through this fellow, who I thought was the job of this fellow, but it wasn't either of those jobs, it was you who I've been needing to talk to, I'm assuming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you require from me, then?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well put!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're asking for access to one of our closely guarded sigils for the Thunderbrands, you "say, within Kraghammer?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, yes. We'll have to speak with them as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know this gentleman?" Turns it around, and you can see in there, this is the same long-bearded dwarven individual that met you at the actual Thunderbrand house, and had a bit of an argument with you early in your travels in Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's really inconvenient, but we have things that we need to get to you quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, listen here. Last we spoke, you and your friends stormed into our lair, nearly "destroyed our precious arcane defenses of our homestead--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He was drinking. He's an alcoholic. He's got help since then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is deception. Well, you are an alcoholic, but that wasn't what he meant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. (laughs) He goes, "Either way, we can't just let anyone willy-nilly knowing how to directly "appear in the center of our homestead."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bring me another accent, aye.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The privilege of quickly traveling to your stead to do business with you, and there would be no other intrusion otherwise. I guarantee it as my name as a Stormwind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chief negotiator!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. His head turns to the side a little bit, peering through you with a slight scowl. "Last we "talked, the reason we didn't report you to the guard for breaking through our defenses was you "promised to look beneath the city and bring back various artifacts you were in search of."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh, we found one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you, now?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A couple, yes. And we killed a bunch of those buttholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I see one of these artifacts?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't have it on me right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're done here, Headmaster." And the mirror shimmers and closes suddenly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good try!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can bring-- oh, we're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The headmaster takes the marble out and says, "I'm sorry that didn't seem to go your way."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's fine, Headmaster. I'll be back in about 15 minutes with the proper proof that we did procure the things that the man, that needed to have proof, did. Excuse me! And I get the hell out of there. And as soon as I get out of there, I cast Fly on myself, and I Gandalf (whoosh) right back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going with the rest of them to Gilmore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way to the outside of Gilmore's Glorious Goods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we walk, do we see Tiberius fly over our heads?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, I'm staying at the Keep.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, Travis is my target, right? Are you still at the Keep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm eating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, across the way-- what's her name, again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sherri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. Sherri, the mousy helper who runs the shop in Gilmore's absence, or at least runs the first portion of it, with her thick glasses up on her nose, and she's sitting there with her elbows over the top of the main desk. She looks up as you enter, and takes her glasses and pokes them for a second. "Hello? Hi."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you remember us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, I do."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Vox Machina? We're sponsored by Gilmore. He put the brand on my armor that my mother gave me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you should be wearing it proudly, yes? Now, what can I help you with?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, is Gilmore around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've been gone a while, and I was hoping to trade news with Glorious Gilmore. Is he not in at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gilmore's in Westruun, currently setting up the expansion of the Gilmore's Glorious Goods "business. If this is important, I can certainly summon him here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd hate to pull him away from business. I don't want to get in the way of his business. I mean, I am rather sad not to see him, but no, I don't think that would be a course of action we'd want to take. Let him continue to set up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I suppose."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you get a message to him, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I can, actually."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, tell him Vax'ildan and friends visited. We're in the city for a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls out a small sheet of what looks like a rough-around-the-edges piece of parchment, and starts the inkwell, scribbling down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax'ildan. That's with an A, not an E. We're here for a week. I don't know if he's going to be back from Westruun before then, but if he is, tell him to get word to me. I'm very interested in exchanging news for the past few weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." (foreign words) It flashes and disappears in front of her. "Well then, he'll be "receiving the message right about now. We'll pass that on, and whenever he returns, I'm certain he "will get back to you and deal with whatever business is necessary."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. We're here late in the day; are you still open for business?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are open, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just curious if you guys had a chance to think about the alchemy workshop that we talked about before, or if you maybe had any alchemy books that came in that I was requesting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's possible. We haven't completely restocked the shelves, as of late. I know we had "some new things come in. I can go check." And as she turns, all of a sudden there's a large, vibrant, white flash of light and a sound from the back room. The beaded curtains shift, for a second, and you hear heavy footsteps. And pushing through the beaded curtain, you see before you, with a bead of sweat on his head, Gilmore! "I'm so glad you came back!"

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. I was out and about, running some business a ways away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't have to go to all that trouble to come back here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How could I miss seeing my fine-- there's not as many of you as usual."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we're seeing to different bits of business. I turn back to him, I walk forward with hands out. I walk up to him, take him by the head, give him a good European-style kiss just about here-- right there-- come back, and say, there is so much to talk about. Where can we be alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I mean--" (laughter) MATT "But of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See to whatever business you need to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just peruse, yeah. We'll window shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks back through the beaded curtain, giving you this look over his shoulder. As he does, the curtain falls behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those beads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jeez!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk right in. Follow him in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's apparently how he got here so quickly. But he walks in, and he kicks the rug back over it, sits down on the edge of his bed, puts his hands up and goes, "What seems to be troubling you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk over and I sit down opposite him, and I say: Before we talk about anything, I feel like I should apologize because although we didn't have any sort of written agreement, you and I are friends, aren't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I was supposed to help bring your brand wherever we went. And I thought that would be possible. We came back from the Underdark. We had a very hard time, some of the hardest weeks of my life. I haven't delivered on my promise. And I mean to, but I haven't yet. I apologize wholeheartedly. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right. I understand: people grow busy. There are things you must tend to, and "that's all right. And I appreciate you being so honest, I really do."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In addition to that, I am changed, and promises mean more to me, even more than they did before. And I promise to follow through. In the interest of time for the game, DM, Vax tells the whole story of the Underdark, of the horn, of how close it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, what is taking him so long, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that's happening, the rest of you are left there awkwardly staring about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did Sherri find my book? Sherri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One is a book that is the properties of various liquids, chemicals, and things that are found on this plane and otherwise. It's a good way to locate and identify phantom liquids, should you come across any.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be good for Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is the source of a lot of phantom liquids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other book appears to have a section about alchemy. It's essentially almost a beginner's guide, but it's a very, very easy-to-follow introduction to a number of various low-level sorceries and the creation of low-level spell components preparing them for use with spell-casting, and there is a chapter on a little bit of alchemy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, how much are these, Sherri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They haven't been priced, yet."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, they're-- they're all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good going, Keyleth! I like it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "25 gold, each."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25 gold, each? Oh, come on. I know some university student dropped these off and donated these. Don't kid me, Sherri. Am I doing it right? Do I sound like Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, make her do a persuasion roll, it'd be funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unforced error.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spoke too soon!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So perfect!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches out and takes the books and slides them back, and says, "Well, if that's how "you feel, perhaps these can be returned to those university students that perhaps left them by. I "should put these in the lost and found."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sherri!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sherri. If I may. What Keyleth was trying to say was that she never got a chance to go to college, and that she wanted to get that university experience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that didn't work. Hey, can you serve me, now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Scanlan. Scanlan! Will you buy those books for me, and I'll reimburse you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can hear you. I'm right here." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walk away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I'm happy to help you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was wondering if you had a small box of some sort that could carry a magical item, and perhaps shield it from detection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on." She darts up the stairway in the other room and goes to the second floor. A few moments later, she comes back down with these two small chests-- they're about that big, each. One's a lighter wood color, the other is painted black all over. "We have both of these. They should shield something of this size from most low-level magical "detections. These will run you about 200 gold apiece."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just need one. You're a woman of the world, and I'm sure you have fine taste, judging by your appearance. It is quite fine, if I may say so myself. If I were a little taller, I would probably ask you out on a date.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you were a little taller, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sherri is sassy today!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She's full of sass!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is the fancier of the two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, looking at these, this one--" She points to the one that looks like just a casual, wood chest. "This would be easier to hide in plain sight amongst the rest of your furniture. This "one, however, would be difficult to locate in a more shaded, or lightless, circumstance."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hm. I want ostentatiousness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then perhaps this one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please. That. Thanks. Thank you. 200 to you. Also, I know Gilmore is otherwise entertained. Can you try to identify something for me? Do you have that-- I mean, judging by the glint in your eye and beauty in your heart, I'm sure you have many skills I don't know about, but I'm wondering if you could identify this small, red vial with a floating something in it, that I procured quite some time ago! Do you remember that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. This vial, if I recall, it has this small--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have I tried this, once before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is the one that was found--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Pike found some stuff in somebody's house? I don't even remember, this was a year ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Yes, okay. There we go. And make a persuasion roll, actually, on this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, look: a real roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion? It's 35. Wait, 31. 31.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt just visited his mind palace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll call this on the house." And as she takes the vial, sets it down, and she pulls out another book that she shuffles through, puts it up, turns through a few pages, until, looking through, "This here would be a Potion of Fire Breath. When "imbibed, it should give you a temporary time period of the ability to breathe fire, much like a "relatively young dragon. This one in particular is fire. There are many different vials like this "that pertain to different colorations of dragon, but this one is specifically for the red."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you so much. Thank you. Well, thank you so much. Two more questions, then I'll leave you alone. One: where can I go get business cards printed up, in this town? It's a calling card? Never mind! Forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like a flyer?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those can be printed. There is a-- actually, a pretty well-designed print facility "not that far up the road."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great! Thank you; I'll go investigate that. And one other thing: you know those books that my friend was asking about? Could we maybe make those happen for her? I know that you had quoted her a low, low price of 25. I'd be prepared to pay even more than that for them. And compose you a little song about yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, for the first time since the entire time you've been in the shop of Gilmore's Glorious Goods, you see a slight grin creep across her lips. She goes, "How could a lady say no to a "song? 25 gold! The price stands."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I have to pay you and sing to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We run a business, here, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls the books out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Sherri baby, Sherri baby, Sherri, won't you come home tonight? Come home tonight? You better ask your mama. Tell her you're without a gnome! Why don't you come home to my keep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pay for the books!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, here you go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, her face is flushed and she, (clears throat).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Druidcraft a flower real quick and slip it to Scanlan to give to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Here you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Did she blush?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's red in the face. At this point in time, the beaded curtains reopen. Have you finished the conversation, or do you want to keep going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. After ten minutes of finishing all that, of telling every tiny detail, if you mind me backtracking, I briefly place my hand on top of his, and say, it was terrible. I've never seen anything like it. Now we're back. We're in our home, and I'm hoping to learn how Uriel is doing, how the city is faring. Is there any news? Things are ill in Kraghammer; they still haven't seen the last of their troubles, but I'm also concerned for our new home here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I'm aware, this city has been doing rather well. Since Winter's Crest just this "previous year, trade has been booming, we're opening up pathways all across the continent, "we've improved relations with many other distant kingdoms, and I'm opening a second shop! I mean, "that's amazing! And who would've thought?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Westruun, how's it going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So far, so good. We're going through the construction process, and I'm making sure that I "have a rather supple income of artifacts and oddities that I have to sell at both locations. I "have to widen my input of various items and--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a busy man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you any time for leisure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though he still looks fabulous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seem a tad weary. Is there anything I can do to help you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just praise the brand. Praise the brand, young Vax."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That will happen. I did not even mean to discuss this, coming here, but I noticed, coming in, a sigil under your carpet. I had no intention of this, but we need to get back to Kraghammer in a bit of a hurry, and I certainly have no abilities, but do you remember my friend Tiberius? Dragonborn fellow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes! Yes, I remember him."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He needs to run an errand back in Kraghammer. Is there any way you could hook us up with a favor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What kind of favor?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to send the lizard to Dwarf Town. Do you think we could make that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Send the lizard to Dwarf Town?" How many more slurs can you have in one sentence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My sigil here is for returning personal use. Did you hear that? There was some strange "noise in the sky. This is for my return. As far as outgoing, most other sigils are-- well, they're up "here. Looking for that, you're going to have to go to the Lyceum, I'm afraid."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood. I don't want to push my luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep that in mind. You go to the Lyceum, you should have access to one of these sigils. Make "sure you choose properly. You only have one."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty magic-stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then don't be the one that does it. Talk to your friend, this Tiberius fellow. He'll know what "to do, I'm sure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Correct. One last. It's small or it's boring, it's business. I need a dagger. I don't want one for free or anything; I want to purchase it, but we're a little low on funds. The reason Tiberius needs to go to Kraghammer is because we're owed a large sum of money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, you mentioned this last time, when you almost opened a line of Gilmore's "Glorious Credit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm. I'm not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would the credit entail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Previously, we discussed 25,000 gold pieces, the amount of which you were going to "retrieve."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to-- what was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Retrieve."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Retrieve? God, I've been in the Underdark so long. What was the deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The deal was since you did not have funds, and you had to retrieve this money from this "'Dwarf Town', as you so graciously put it, that you would borrow the money, at the time, and then "pay me back within a month. Within a month."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is Gilmore trying to say we owe him money?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. We almost did that. Correct, DM? That's what we almost did, but we didn't do it. You offered it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You backed out last minute when you realized there was, apparently, hidden platinum--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would be interested-- Gilmore? I really just need a quick favor, and I mean to pay you back quickly. I need a dagger for something. Not your best dagger. Not your shittiest dagger, either. I just need something nice. How much would a fine dagger cost? Something that would be good in a fight. And could I pay you back in a couple of days, once Tiberius returns from Kraghammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you want something functional, there are masterwork daggers out there. We do have "base-level enchantments that give you a fine, honed edge and a balance that cannot be beaten for "its price range. For that, I can easily give you one of our base-level enchanted items for no more "than, friend discount included, 400 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a pretty good deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I please purchase three of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Three for you! "That'll be 1,200 gold pieces, please."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach out and I give his cheek a little bubby-squeeze, and I clap him on the cheek, and say, I'm good on my word, and you're a good friend. Thank you, Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The least I could do. Pay me back. I'll find you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you're good on your word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth? Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! How'd it go in there? You're walking straight, so it couldn't have gone too well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very good. Warm in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That dagger's so sharp, it could cut the sexual tension.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Those are masterwork daggers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are plus-one enchanted daggers, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's get out of here and go. Did you find us any--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good. No, everything's good here. Just not everywhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here, go back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, now, Tiberius, you have coasted over the air, and as you come careening in, you hear (swishing sounds) and look down. Two crossbow bolts whiz past you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's me, you idiots!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which you hear immediately, "Oh, sorry!" "Sorry! We're not used to having you bolt in from "the skyline."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm in a hurry, sorry! (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you sweep past Shayne and Cordell, they both change their bolts, and they're both arguing with each other, like, "You should've seen it was him!" "Sorry." "Sorry, again!" You make your way into the courtyard, inside Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why'd you miss?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we have a bunch of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not with him, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk into the room to see Tiberius throwing things out of the Bag of Holding, I'm assuming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't, because I have to visualize what it is to pull it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what are you looking for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using my earring on the walk home. Does it work? I don't know what the range is. Tiberius, can you hear me? Tibs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pretty out of range at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you looking for, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I've taken my hand out. When we were in the Underdark and one of the items that we procured while we were scavenging, and we looted it, and we could give it back to the Thunderbrand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Pieces of the enemy? We get paid for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They wanted a necklace, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. And we found one or two of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Found a necklace, who was supposed to go-- hang on, I'm finding it, I'm looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got two gold necklaces, two gold chalices, and two rubies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was actually a magical item, one that you may have equipped. It'll say in the description of the item that it has an inscription on the back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have that shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, what? It was a necklace we're talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amulet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't have that. (gasps) Oh no! What if we gave it to Kima?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We didn't give it to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Kima took some armor we found!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Amulet of Natural Armor?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look in the description of the item. It should say underneath the name. It'll have the actual inscription written in the descriptor of the item.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody look at your stuff. I look inside my Belt of Dwarvenkind, and it says "Badass."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a sapphire pendant that should say, "To Lorna, my love."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I like your hair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It looks cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is enchanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the one you're wearing, right, Scanlan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I remember we found it and nobody equipped it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had it in the bag, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I take it out, and I put it in mine. Grog, I'm finding out a way, as soon as I can show this to you, fellow. I'm going to go into Kraghammer very, very fast as opposed to slowly, and it is, so we should leave right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go with you?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, and I'll cast-- because, who was around, just them two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just those two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly again at 3rd or 4th level, to cast on them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, all of a sudden, you're (whoosh) lifted up in the air.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I take off after him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if I want to stay?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You can stay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm fucking floating above my meal! No! This is bullshit. And I'm bouncing off the ceiling and shit. Can I control myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. It takes a moment to adjust to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just start trying to swim down to my plate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a little bit, but you do eventually get control of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (farting noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Propulsion does work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're flying, can I keep an eye out for our party members that are returning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. And as you guys coast over, you see, leaving the exterior wall gate to the south side of Emon, you see the rest of your party walking back towards the keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means we're close enough. Brother!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're heading to the portal, Tiberius is working on something. We can get there faster! I'll be back soon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can send Tiberius through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brilliant!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh, that gives me a wonderful idea! And then, I'll cast it at 4th level again, and I'll go (pew-pew!) and cast it on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just because I think it's funny-- Grog is flying over too, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I've got priorities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, I see you guys are flying? The two of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you fly down and cast Fly on the rest of them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right. Come on, follow me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, I've never flown before! This is amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm flying, too? What's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are now floating. You guys are floating, as well. You're coasting over Emon for roughly 12 or so seconds before Grog, you drop to the ground, and now Tiberius and Vex, you begin to plummet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we plummeting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fly is a concentration spell. You cast it again. Your amulet keeps it up for two rounds, which is 12 seconds, and then the previous Fly spell deteriorates.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What about my circlet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. The circlet lets you maintain concentration for two additional rounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay! Tiberius, I'm falling!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly again at 6th-level on everybody else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start falling.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, because I can catch everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point, now all of you guys are flying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You fall in the kitchen, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that makes sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this going to stick, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. It's the same spell. I just really need a nap after this. I really need a nap after this. I go back to gather them all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way. Now, all of you following Tiberius, you coast down to the Alabaster Lyceum, landing right through the front area (whoosh), this whole party appears. Catch your feet, and there you see the same clerk looking up. "Ah, I see you've returned."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. Can we not talk to the middle guy first? Can we go right to the last guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Down that hallway. Follow it to the very end."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Follow me, everybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all glide through the hallway, or walk, if you prefer. The end of the hallway, you open once again into the office, and there you see behind his desk once again, the headmaster Thurmond, who looks around. "Oh, yes. You've returned. I received the note from your friend "Gilmore, and you're welcome to utilize one of our sigils."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful. That makes me quite happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To Kraghammer, was it?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, but I do not want to use that favor for that sigil. I would like to call our friends, and I brought the item. I bring out the amulet. I want to show our friends in Kraghammer that we actually brought them the thing to get their permission to go on their sigil, and the other continent that we were on is called what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vasselheim?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. The favor I would like for Gilmore is to get the Vasselheim sigil, please. But let's contact our friends at Kraghammer first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have been outlawed and destroyed to prevent "arcane intrusion or subterfuge. There have been, historically, many a war's passed in which "Vasselheim nearly fell to the sudden appearance of small armies within its walls, and as such, "many of these sigils, all of them have been destroyed over the past 1,000 years. However, it "was the third war--" And he's going into a long diatribe about the history of Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so educated. Perhaps we could talk later about all of this wonderful history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. Yes, I'm sorry. The mirror." He pulls up the mirror, pulls out his chest, brings out the same marble again, pops it into the mirror. It shimmers. "Hello? Hello?" You hear another voice say, "Oh, are you kidding me? Really? You again? All right, what are you "bothering me with?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Using my Mage Hand, I'm like, it's one of the things that you wanted us to get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you talking to?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can see it. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Read it out for me."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What does it say, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Lorna, with love. It's written right there, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, sorry. To Lorna, with love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you see the eyes of this dwarf that were very untrusting open wide for a second. "All right. Give him the sigil. Send him through. I'll see you soon." The mirror gives out again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the headmaster takes the mirror and puts it down. He points back to the clerk who's in the hallway behind you again, waiting, and says, "Go ahead and bring them to the Junction. Allow them "access to the sigil for House Thunderbrand in Kraghammer." He nods. "Of course."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's doing this, I'm writing the sigil that I'm seeing forming in my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you to the Junction, and there is one of the doors he opens up on the inside, there is the actual sigil to Kraghammer there. He gives you some time to study it, you memorize it, you get it locked in, and you now permanently know the sigil of teleportation to Kraghammer within the House Thunderbrand.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shall we go collect our money now?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all going? All of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I guess just the five of us, cause Grog and Percy are back at the Keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you rather just send Tiberius, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we should go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go back and check in on them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everybody's here but Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Tinkering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have an errand to run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have an errand to run? All right, I'll go with Vax--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the three of us, me and you and--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Thunderbrands are buttholes, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all right. That's why we're taking the heaviest hitters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. We'll address that later. Come on, Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Persuasion-wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys head back to the Keep, you meet up with Grog and Percy, what about you guys? What're you doing? For, Tiberius, Scanlan, and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's just the sigil. You have to cast the spell.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. Is that what you want to do? Is that what's going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a spell?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: All that flying left me a bit exhausted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorcerers, they improvise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you're saying that we cannot go through?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, hold on. Maybe there's a way I could trigger the spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go home and go to sleep.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's get a drink, maybe? It's only been a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can cast that sigil anywhere, right? You don't have to be here? We could do it from home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then let's just fucking go home.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What time of the day is this? It's still afternoonish, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, with all the travel back and forth, it's getting close to dusk.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're probably just sitting down for dinner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They live in the Underdark. There's no real time there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My swallow's been crafted at the other place, right? Has that happened already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a quarterstaff with knives attached.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm calling it swallow. On the way back, because we're obviously going to leave in the morning, to do stuff. I'd like to quickly stop at any blacksmith I see on the way back to Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, there are a couple blacksmiths that you know about on the way through.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I go to the good one, not the bad one, per reputation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best reputation is Karin, but she's a specialist. She's the one that made Trinket's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Karin!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll go to her, because she's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's currently working away on some custom piece that she's currently working on. She's like, "Hello, can I help you, dragonborn?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I'm Tiberius Stormwind from Draconia; moreover, from Vox Machina--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can I help you with?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Sorry, right. We've done business before. I would like to commission you. And as I'm doing this I'm taking out five of my daggers that I have, and I'm going to hand them to her. I would like to commission you to somehow craft these daggers into a type of bended glaive, if you would. I don't know how long it would take you to do so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You see, it's like, it would look like this, but it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Krull?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, totally, but the blades are bended, but they're all connected in the center. You could use an iron, or a steel ingot to connect the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can certainly try, yeah, aye."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. It would take me about two days? And you've already supplied the material, other "than a bit of the side bits. I'll say I'll charge you 100 gold pieces."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 100 gold pieces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, I'm a specialist!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You went to the good one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What, that's all? I mean, oh yes, of course. Here's 120.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. Thank you. All right, it should be done within the next two days. You're free to "come by and check on it if you like, but it'll be done."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I trust your work. Trinket's armor was fantastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did she do that? I thought that was the same character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Karin.

lines.name: SAM
