lines.text: She just thought bear. She just knows bear.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Bear's armor. The bear's armor was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Happy to help with that one."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: His name is Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, is that what it was?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm surprised she didn't tell you. It's an adorable name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably had. It's just been a while."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is Lockheed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you're so cute, Lockheed." You guys talk for a little bit and eventually make your way back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I do business with her, and I go back to the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we still waiting for him outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are right outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go home now, please, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any other stops you'd like to make? The dry-cleaners, perhaps?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Prestidigitation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's great. Now let's go night-night so you can cast a spell on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys head back to the keep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're doing that, I stealth away from the group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a passive perception check to see if I notice him sneaking away?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would like to fart. Natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a huge fart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll perception.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 32.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception or passive perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, because it's not active? It would be your passive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then that is 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax has vanished. While you might have noticed, instead the explosion-like eruption of gas from your dragonborn friend distracted you and gave him the proper getaway. You vanish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm totally down an alleyway, through the alley, onto another main thoroughfare. I grab a random person on the street. Excuse me, I'm looking for a specific butcher. Harold the butcher. Do you know? I think he's in the upper slums. Can you point me toward him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The individual you stopped is a younger gentleman, probably in his mid-20s or so, a bit dirty in the face and coming from a day of work, going to the local tavern to finish his eve with some drinks. "I can't say I do. I mean, there are butchers all over town. There's one--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the upper slums? Upper slums, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that would be north side of Emon. That way." He points you towards the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how long that will take me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will take you about, from where you are right now, 30 minutes. All right, so you guys get back to the keep. Grog has eaten his fill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm asleep on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Passed out. Percy's nowhere to be seen. You, I would like for you to make a tinkering roll in relation to the construction of ammunition.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You manage to, utilizing material for 20 bullets, only craft ten. But you get ten bullets out of it, as opposed to wasting the materials.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Could I try to dip the tip of one of my bolts in that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. There's a difference between poison and disease. They're different. The potion seems to have no effect.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: On bolts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't have any effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many batches of bullets are you going to let me attempt to make?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tomorrow, we'll get to whatever it is you want to craft then. You go off and manage to make your way to the upper slums.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I see a stunted old woman and stop her on the street and say, Grandmother. I'm looking for Harold the butcher. Do you know where I can find him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's missing teeth, but her crooked finger curves off to the side, and you can see across the way, next to a homestead or hovel, there is a very humble-looking butcher that is currently in the process of closing shop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to go stealth. I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You make your way up there. You can see there's an older gentleman in his mid-40s or so, salt-and-pepper hair, black with a bit of gray on the sides, is currently in the process of closing up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I see Kynan anywhere? No? And it's a home? It's a business and a home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. It looks like a business from this perspective.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'd like to go around the back of the building and scope it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look through the windows. There's a dull light on the inside from what looks like a small hooded lantern set up for a bit of interior light, but there's nobody else in the house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nobody in? I'd like to, at the window, listen and use perception to see if I can tell if anyone's inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You listen for a while. Make a perception roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you continue to listen, eventually you hear the slamming of wood. You look off, and through the bit of the glass window-- you're peeking from the side-- you see the same gentleman who was closing the shop enter the room where the hooded lantern is. There's a table. He sits down quietly for a second, looks at the lamp, starts cleaning his fingernails a little bit, gives a big sigh, and turns off the light of the lantern and exits the room, closing the door behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it one floor, the building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's one floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's one floor. Is the window locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You checked the window. It's not locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm climbing in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slip in without a problem. You've done this many times before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there bedrooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two other doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not trapped, are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to crouch down and push open the first door. What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door immediately right or the door in front of you? The door in front of you is the one that the man traveled through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no. Not that one. There were two other doors, weren't there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the door that he came in from when he sat down, and then he left through the door across the way from you, and there is a door that been unopened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's one other door? That's the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peering inside, it's dark. There appears to be a bed. There's a small table. There's what looks like an old pair of boots that are worn out on the side. It looks like a bedroom that nobody's currently in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's no sign that this is a youth's bedroom or father's bedroom? What can I glean from what I see in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. That's better. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a little bit of time in peering over the materials, looking at the bed size, looking at the boot size, looking at whatever you can nearby. This bed is definitely weathered. It's been used for a long time. There are a couple of small knick-knacks and toys that are discarded underneath that have been there for a while that lead you to believe that this was at one point a boy's room. However, what you do notice is that most of the materials, most of the belongings, anything that you would normally see in a boy's room, anything that would say that a person lives here seem to have been hastily grabbed and taken off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the father went out the other way? All right, so I creep back out the window and I go out the front and I knock really loud on the front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple moments later, a voice comes from the other side. "Hello?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello. I'm sorry, I don't mean to bother you. I know you've closed up shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm done for business for the day. Come back tomorrow."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm actually not looking to buy anything. I owe your son a bit of money. I lost some money in a wager we made on a dog fight, and I was hoping to reimburse him. Do you know where he is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens a little bit, and an eye peeks through. You gather there's a slight scent of alcohol from the other side as he starts talking. He says, "I don't know where my son's "gone off to. He came in in a huff. We got in an argument. He grabbed his stuff and left. He does "this every now and then. He'll be back."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think he'll be back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This isn't the first time he's done this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to leave something with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said it was money you owed him?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can give that to him."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to use insight on him to make sure he's trustworthy. Oh, that's good. That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's something about his face that gives you the feeling that he's more interested in the contents of what you're leaving than actually transferring these to the intended recipient.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just give him the 50 gold. Thank you. And I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Closes the door behind you, you hear a lock. Light goes back out in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go in there and kill him. Kill him, shit on his bed, and leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I head back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, eventually Vax finds his way back to the keep. The rest of you are there, at rest for the evening. Is there anything else you want to accomplish before the night's out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just flipped through my book on the alchemy section for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all find yourself to bed for the evening, rest up for the next morning, and at that point we're going to go ahead and take our break. Five minutes, guys, a strict five minutes because we still have a lot to get through. A lot to get through tonight, don't want to stay late.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another nine hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing for many reasons. But all of you who are currently watching, be active in the chatroom so you can be included in the next giveaway we're doing. Giveaway's going to include a signed picture of the cast, a signed poster by the cast of the amazing art of our fantastic artist, Kit Buss.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe signed by Kit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So please be active in the chatroom, be part of that giveaway when it gets put out, and thank you guys so much for being so amazing and getting us to that point that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! You 7,500 people, fucking thank you, man. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But only you 7,500. The rest can fuck off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's get back and see if we can, see if we can roll through some of this stuff. As you wake the next morning, you guys awaken to the dull sound of metal clanging as Percy has already been the first to wake and is back in the workshop. Tiberius, you're well-rested. Everyone's spells have returned. You get to make a beard roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beard check, please! Three. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to get prizes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Adorable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're starting to get a little, you notice the first time you grew some facial hair it was coming through that weird, creepy translucent color? It's starting to come through with a proper, almost a dark red-brown color to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got a little bit of the Irish thing going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I might have to get a cage; the women are going to come running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good morning, Vox Machina. Lovely to see all of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So Grog, you fell asleep in your plate of food and woke up with a beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we checked to make sure it's not a stain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, fuck off with your stinging, burning shit, all right? I'm not putting anything else in water. I don't know if you know, Scanlan, but water burns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Percy, now he's never going to bathe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You may have taken the wrong lesson away from that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I pretty much got it. In, burn, ouch, powder.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're not a chinchilla, Grog, which is a small creature that bathes itself in dust. But you are a human, which water is good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not a human.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, you are a humanoid. Which is, water is good. Which, most of you is water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) You always drink water when we drink. Does it burn?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, it feels rather--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does breathe fire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm feeding Lockheed some of my breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lockheed is looking healthier. The color is a little more of a deep emerald green, and he appears to have a little more energy this morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it shit on your shoulder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hasn't noticed, but there is a slight streak of dried pseudo-dragon poo. You're not aware of it to cast that yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Methinks the DM doth speak from experience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bird owner, he does.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to, I rolled, I'm going to do a roll for the day, I think I rolled one for the day, and I'm going to go: Staht. Staht. And I'm going to, I rolled a 14 to try to teach it to sit. Staht.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (lizard noises) It sits down on the edge of the table.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I give it a treat. Krar, Krar, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bites your finger.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As it's hanging, I put it on my shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (lizard noises) It sits there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They get nippy. It's in the breed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So! What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I'm having my oatmeal and such, I start to cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still think maybe the more talkative members of the group should go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still want to split the party?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying home, anyway

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm checking in with Tiberius-- oh sorry, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the teleportation sigil appears in the center of the floor the way Tiberius had prepared it. It's glowing right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got the creature bits so I should go, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You! Take care of my bear, I'm leaving him here with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I got him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Trinket! I love you so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket comes up and like rubs his nose against your coat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behave, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to feed you so much chocolate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really bad for him! Don't!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sigil's starting to spark--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I jump in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I jump in, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so all of you who are going, you leap in. You're staying and you're staying, correct? And you're staying. All right, Keyleth, Percy and Vax. All of you guys step in and all of a sudden there's a familiar whoosh of some sort of dark transference, you feel as if gravity for a moment doesn't exist and your feet find purchase on some sort of a wooden floor. The room is dark. You glance about the immediate vicinity, and for those of you who have low light, there's very little you can actually make out other than the fact this is a basement of some kind, and you are amidst a bunch of sheet covered crates.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Light! (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the light fills the room, you look around.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast it on Lockheed. On his tail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Lockheed begins trying to shake the light off the tail, so it moves around a little bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Bensvelk! That means "good" in Draconian. Bensvelk. And I feed him a treat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) All right! You look around the room, there are about six or seven of these crates immediately visible to you. They have sheets put over them, they're different sizes, some sort of storage room. There is a staircase that leads to the floor above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Do they know we're coming? We're just in the middle of their home now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It'll be good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I perception and make sure there's no traps around us? Just to make sure. We're just popping in, and this is a magic house, am I right? So I can't check for traps worth shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Room looks safe!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Good. Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, good. Let's get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way to the second floor. As you step up to the top you can see there is light emanating from the top of the staircase and a figure moves into the staircase. A stout dwarven figure. This is the same individual you spoke to previously. The dwarf steps to the top and says, with an air of annoyance to the voice. "All right. Waited up all night for you to "arrive, and you never did. And you come here and interrupt my breakfast."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm sorry. We thought you would like a night's sleep before we intrude and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine, step up the stairs, please." and he steps out of the way, leads you into the central chamber. This house is unfamiliar to all but Scanlan, who turned invisible suddenly and decided to wander in briefly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I did. My old stomping grounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where's the amulet?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll open the Bag of Holding. And I'll take it out. Before I actually go over and speak, I'm going to turn to Scanlan and Vex. Is he the same person who pays us for the other--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I should probably go find that guy. Or we can go all together.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I just didn't want to say the wrong thing this time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, don't worry. You will.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Here is the amulet. And I show him. Now, as far as trade, as it was rather taxing to procure this particular artifact--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Incredibly difficult, he means to say.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, she's correct. I was wondering if we could, perchance, trade it for a favor of your arcane ability?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's funny, because I already did. I gave you a permanent entry to my own household, my "family's household, by offering you this sigil, that gave you entrance to the interior of our "well-guarded estate. That was a trade enough. That was what we agreed upon through the mirror."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was just to get me here quicker, I thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you come into my home and try to extort me?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I hand him the amulet as I'm saying this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the amulet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And not as a trade, but as a favor for just the effort, or maybe because I'm not strong enough as a sorcerer myself to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People speak very, very highly of your abilities. Can I assist him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going to matter. You keep talking, and as you're explaining this, he's not even paying attention to you. The dwarf is staring at the amulet, looking at the back of it where the inscription is. And you swear for a minute, you see what looks like a tear, gathering in the corner of the eye of the dwarf, who then reaches up and wipes it from the corner and takes the amulet and puts it in the pocket and says, "My apologies. Thank you for returning this. You were "talking about the carpet, right?"

lines.name: LAURA, ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want it to be enchanted?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've heard very wonderful things about your abilities and not many people can do such a feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very possible."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look anything like this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A carpet of this size, especially."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're looking at the better part of a year to enchant this and that'll cost you about, time "included, that'll cost 50,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! I throw my hands up. I just can't. I just can't! How did we not? Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's very fond of the carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my arm around Vex and try and console her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 50? A year! Why?! Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well I mean, there might be smaller ones you might be able to find elsewhere."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I know it's a really beautiful carpet, and it would cost a lot of money to fix up, I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She loves the hand-woven carpets. It's just very tragic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, well--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we go get our money now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, who's the man we need to see about that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's the Kraghammer-- We go to see--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Johnny Kraghammer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Johnny Kraghammer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nostoc Greyspine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was Greyspine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just assumed you'd all got yourselves killed, like "the usual bumpkins who come wandering this far down in the mountain."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Under-- dark-- carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's-- That time of the month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Excuse me. We came to collect the money you owed us for completing the mission you sent us on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the price we had agreed for that one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it was 30,000 gold, plus all the extras for the scalps that we acquired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I dump it on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, I'm pretty sure at practically no point in your adventure to the Underdark did you ever say you were scalping a creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're above base--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We totally forgot about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You completely, in the entirety of that adventure, didn't collect a single scalp from anything you killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought I grabbed the brain chunk. I thought I grabbed an arm, too. There was just an arm from the stitched guy, and I just grabbed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An arm is not a scalp. It's this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nostoc also looks at you and goes, "And while I respect your memory, a dwarf's mind is "like a trap that you can't escape. I believe the agreed upon price was 25,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh it was? That is so weird, I remember 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't even know what you fought. If you're going to collect your money, tell me what "the hell you freaking killed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mind flayers! A beholder! Have you heard of a beholder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You fought a beholder?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We fought a fucking beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really? And you're all still alive?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well no, not all of us. If you'll recall there were more of us when we came down here. And some of us aren't here because they died.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start pretending to cry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start thinking about the carpet and I really do start crying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a bear!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sobbing) And my bear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beholder, you say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was really big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What else did you encounter?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Illithid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lots of illithid. A whole city of illithid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A whole city of illithid?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We destroyed half of an elder brain-- Part of an elder brain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there were all these dark--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dwarves! There were dark dwarves. Duergar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It really happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There were these wrinkled testicles that were walking around on feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He almost died! Just from this one little brain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strange thing. If you're stupid, and it looks at you with its wrinkled testicle face? You go unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know the creatures you speak of. I've dealt with my share of duergar, though--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I completely stayed away from it, because I was terrified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Roll high!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we all rolling? Because we're all talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were spearheading that part of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was? I thought Scanlan was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan already made his roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about giving her advantage because I was talking about testicles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No testicle advantage on that roll. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In what circumstance would testicle advantage come into play?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At Gilmore's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? "Looking at your number, I can see that you've certainly encountered some dangerous things "in your travels, taken some losses. And I will say, since you've left, we haven't had at least "one excursion interrupting our mine, which has been very helpful. The fact that you've returned "with these tales-- I believe most of it. I'd say, given that circumstance, I'd be happy to pay you "up to 18,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to cast Suggestion on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18,000 gold in addition to the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's casting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's doing it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the DC? You don't have your hand cone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have my hand cone out. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Money!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you suggesting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to suggest to him that he is an honorable man and we had a deal. And that he should honor it, to the fullest extent of the word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks about at the rest of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also, as a cantrip-- oh god, I hope it's not concentration. Forget it. I'm not going to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Greyspine name holds weight in this city, the last thing I want is that that be "sullied by miscommunication. If we agreed to 25,000, I'll pay 25,000. But I hear a single "disagreement out there, or a bad word that came from your lips about our exchange here, and I'm "going to come for the rest of that money."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold up the duergar's severed arm, and I curl all the fingers in and make a thumbs-up like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks back at you, very slowly, as you do this, with a tense stare. (laughs) "All right, all "right." And he starts bringing up coin purse, after coin purse, after coin purse, counting it up as he does. It takes him about five minutes or so, and eventually he counts out, at your vision to improve it, 25,000 gold pieces and platinum pieces and pushes it across to you guys. You've retrieved that. No additional funds, as no scalps were collected, but you do get 25,000.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can hold onto that, thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're very gracious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) 25,000 gold in my hands right now. Thank you so much. This won't make up for the lost lives we have suffered, but-- (choking up) It helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perhaps you'll be less stupid in the future."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not. We should go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember the blood we spilled for your people and your safety.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vox Machina! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I go to give him a business card, but then I realize I never got them printed so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also! Gilmore's Glorious Goods! Great work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Gilmore's! If you're ever overdark, come check it out. It's a great store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like an unexpected web pop-up, he gives you an expression of: where is this coming from? "Get out! Get out of my office!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius, how do we get out of here quickly?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I start going back to the chamber and I'll do the spell again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do it again? Don't you have to rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do it twice? 6th-level spell twice?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No it's a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? The teleportation?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it is. You're right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, very well. And then we'll go back to-- I'll choose Emon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me? As soon as they left, Trinket and I, we left, and I went to the nearest shop and bought a lot of pink ribbon, and I have been furiously tying bows all through Trinket's hair, the entire time they've been gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually I'll help with that campaign. I do some braids, and add some flowers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth has been weaving flowers in, and I have been knotting braids. Started at the head, and then worked all the way down Trinket's back and down the tail. The entire time. Feverishly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I come up for lunch. Keyleth, can I borrow you for a-- what in good god?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it important? Do you need me right now? This is pretty important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Trinket comfortable with this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's so comfortable! Look, I gave him plenty of treats, he doesn't even know what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sad bear noises) This mournful low, guttural groan. You're pretty sure it translates to, "Why?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feed him a piece of chocolate at that moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't give him chocolate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He licks it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth, can I borrow you? When you have a moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten more minutes. I'll be down in ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes about ten minutes before the keep doors open and the rest of your party returns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I run downstairs really fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Side note, I let Trinket give me bear-kisses all over my face. Vex never lets Trinket kiss her face, and it's so sad, and I let him just drool all over my face everywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we're playing out some real-world psychodrama here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As this is going on, I want to turn to Scanlan and go, Gnome. I have an idea that I want to run by you. No, your name's Scanlan. Okay. I was going to go and do this, just on a whim as I usually do, but I was thinking that we should speak to Allura, and I don't think I should speak to her alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I must be asleep. Are you planning something? Ahead of time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That's amazing!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You know. Like I told Vax, you just have to chill out sometimes, and I'm like, well, maybe I should run it by the man with the mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, she's the woman you fancy quite a bit, isn't that true?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. This is more business rather than denied pleasure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want to speak with her about?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, as far as I see it, there's no other way to get our carpet reenchanted. I want to confess what we did to her, and hopefully she takes mercy and helps us out with this, as we've helped her out far beyond anything that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in the discussion, you guys all look up and see, sitting in the center of the main foyer area of Greyskull, a very mighty bear, brought down low, sitting covered in pink ribbons, looking forward, going (distressed bear noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See? I told you it was a girl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! You look so cute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I knew she'd love it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get these off of you immediately. But you look really, really cute. And I scratch his little ears. How dare--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over, too, there are traces of chocolate smears across the face of Vax.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vex. No, Vex. Yes. Stand over-- and I use my Still Image and take a little spell of her--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say it. Staffie. Just say staffie.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, but it's of her, it's a youie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's with your staff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the piece of art immortalized upon? A piece of wood?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. And I open my Scroll of Telescription, I'm like, see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh look, now I can remember this moment forever. Thank you. Trinket, let's go get you a bath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got so much money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and put it in the party funds. We got our gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job. We can pay back Gilmore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For my share? Just my share.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we splitting up all the party gold now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vex? I give her the picture. Now you have a picture of your bear with the silly bows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I take advantage of her good mood and say, I just want 1,200 gold, and I won't ask for any more of it, any of the amount.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh, yes, I would like the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to just split up all the party gold right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't, no. Just give us a quick stipend. Give us each 1,500 and let's move on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody gets 1,500. Is everybody happy? Trinket, are you just so thrilled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sad bear noises) He's pulling them out with his claws as best he can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sweetie. Bath time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket stands up and heads out to the front courtyard. All right, so it's 1,500 times seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do the math.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go do our recon. Who's doing it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to kill them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're just going to go spy on them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to finish my morning crafting before moving into the evening crafting. I'm going to have help. I'm working on project number three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is probably going to take you the rest of the week. It's an extensive project.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I have a little help? This is something I've been tinkering with for quite a while, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it's also the most complicated thing, outside of the gun, that you've constructed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got a couple more days, too.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How many days have passed, since we've been doing this? Two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, you go to work. We'll figure out everything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think I'll have time to finish everything that's on my list, if I roll well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not everything. You'll have to choose between a couple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if he rolls a 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I was going to have Keyleth lightning spell to help set the battery for the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Well, that is technically an enchantment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it just uses it to start a charge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, to start a charge? Then you can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I was going to Frankenstein this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We can begin the roll now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a tinkering roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, okay. Not actually doing the charge yet, because you're building the basis of the structure. You help him downstairs in his workshop with the various materials to begin crafting the actual shell of the the item. What else are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go do recon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what are we checking out, though? I mean, it's not like the Briarwoods are out in public. We don't know anything about them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to ask around town about the Briarwoods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get into the Briarwoods' estate and talk to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're coming into town in five to seven days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're arriving now in six days and arriving for the actual feast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the feast to be held?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's to be held in the palace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. We can't do any spying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not on them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: All we can do is get gear and do things and we can sleep for a few days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can help me in the workshop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a plan. Maybe make a plan? We don't really have a plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you remind me and the group, the dinner, I know it's with the Briarwoods, but who else? Is it with Uriel or who is it with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a large channel where these two large mountain ranges, which are the closest the two continents are to each other, but it's a very treacherous pass of water, so any trade having to be done has had to travel southward, in a big arc around the bottom of the island, or via skyship, both very expensive. This bridge will enable a much faster trade route between the two continents, and Whitestone has essentially been in charge of spearheading the construction of this bridge and making this agreement with Uriel, that would be overall helpful for both continents. And since they've agreed upon this, they've been invited here to Emon for the first time to have dinner with the Council and Uriel to celebrate it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We maybe want to talk to Uriel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. Maybe you guys should go, because I want to spend the next few days training Trinket how to roly-poly roll forward and bludgeon people with his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, the only thing I can think-- Percy. Do you still have an idea of what the Briarwoods look like?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could even possibly go to Allura for help and try again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if Allura will come here, because I want to keep working. And I'll also say we should send word to Uriel that I will not be myself at the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that might be very strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should maybe send word to him that the Briarwoods should be watched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The less we say, the better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you say that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think Uriel might be in the Briarwoods' pocket and pass on that we're aware.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would not be the first time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, even if you wear this disguise hat, Percy, how are you going to get into this event? It's a private event. You can't just be some random person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will be with you, and if we can let Uriel know that I am coming under a false pretense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but that's going to arouse all kinds of suspicion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly, yeah, if we tell Uriel you're coming as someone else, he's going to ask why.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He knows that I don't trust them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He does?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, who was it that came and talked to us? Who was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Seeker Asum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, it was Seeker Asum, but he didn't say that Uriel had his doubts, he said he had his doubts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So let's let Asum know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let Asum know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you disguise yourself as--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burt Reynolds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Vax? He can sneak in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will the hat let me choose who I look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hat, like any Minor Illusion spell, you can choose your appearance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much of a shape-change can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can look pretty close to somebody else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could I look like Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. But as it is an illusion, there is no physical-- so if somebody were to reach up and touch your shoulder, it would just pass through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, and your voice doesn't change, so you probably don't want to try and sound like Grog all night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I was actually thinking of Pike, but.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, Pike. You could be Pike. You would be a very big Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, there's nothing I want more than for you to take Bad News and unload it on every one of those motherfucking shits, but if you're me and I'm nobody, if I'm a ghost, I can help take out one or two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll stick to the shadows, and I'll be you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not to be-- sorry, you were going to say something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's actually a pretty good plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many days left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask you a question, DM? I have in the assassin perks. I think it says seven days, I can be anybody. As long as I don't do anything else and I work on getting the right papers, and no one will know who I am, 100%, but it's six days, so am I shit out of luck? This is why I was talking about it yesterday, motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. It's a good plan. I think this plan is a good plan.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think we'll be fine, because I have privilege perk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You make me invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also do that. Or he can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, one of you two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem. I know it's a few days off, but we should have some sort of safe word. Some sort of attack word. Grog, any suggestions?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jenga.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Jenga.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like that. We're not hired to kill the Briarwoods, and not to be that member of the group that has a golden heart and wants to ruin everyone's fun. I don't want to stand between you and your revenge that you are absolutely owed, Percy, but are you sure this is what you want? Is this going to make you feel better?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what I want. I want to see them. I want to look at them. I want to see them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to talk to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I want to listen to them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we follow your lead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see them. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want us to fucking capture them and drag them back to the cell that we built in our keep? We built it for a reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whistles) She gambles now. She's crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I've been opened up to so many things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The best I can give you is we'll just have to see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, I trust you implicitly. You have earned that trust. Do you believe them to be evil in the purest sense?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: That's all we need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't even need that much. If you'd just said to kill someone, we'd probably do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we prepare? Let's do it! I've been training Trinket, though, does that help?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been reading my alchemy books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six beard checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went to get business cards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. That'll cost you 25 gold for 100.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get two sets. One says Scanlan Shorthalt, one says Burt Reynolds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both have been constructed without question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I repaid my debt to Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, debt is paid, mark off that gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at five total, right? 46. 45. 55. A one. And a 95.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a full, we're talking Portland man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another thing that I did was go off and get a lathering cream, and the second to last night, after I took Grog out to the tavern, I bought him a lot of drinks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I assume dodge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only half of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just became the most handsome man in the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not shave his fucking beard off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check. Make a perception check. You just broke a mechanical pencil! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleeping soundly, drunk, you do not hear the approach of Vax. As you pull out your blade and get ready, I want you to roll a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After the 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One thing to not be noticed. It's another to shave someone's face without being noticed. This is about stillness of fingers, not just how stealthy you can be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using Luck. Okay, so I rolled a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check, Grog. With advantage because this is against your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you so evil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did he trip me and make me eat shit two months ago?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA, ORION
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Appetizer of things to come, my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crowing sound of a distant rooster. The farmlands that surround the outside of Emon, which are relatively close, within earshot. The morning sun rises, cresting over the eastern skyline of Tal'Dorei. Grog, you come to consciousness, stretch, reach up to rub-- half a beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half a beard? Like, just one side of my face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One side of your face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I say in a low, guttural growl--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have no idea it was me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax. I didn't have to wake up to know it was you, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an intelligence check! Make him make an intelligence check!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all know it was you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach down, I find a dark stone on the ground, and I go over to the bare side of my face and I draw a very beautiful mustache to complete the other half of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is dumb as a post. Why does he know--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you're the only fucking idiot stupid enough to do that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic is mysterious! Why couldn't you grow half a beard due to magic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it is a new morning. Roll a beard check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight, four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as a note, Percy, I want you to make four more tinkering rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Do you want to build a machine gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Why, yes, I really do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What have you got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, okay. Second one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dice going everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspiration, d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a d6 from the last one you did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d6 is what I gave you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: d10, so I'll roll a d10 with the next one. That one was 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Third one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and the fourth one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so over the next few days, you've constructed what amounts to a large, metallic gauntlet. You have taken this gauntlet and wired all through it insulation and metallic insulating tips in what is essentially a small, for lack of a better term, alternator of some kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to try to sneak in a few bullets during that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, I'm going to have you roll a wisdom check. Roll that and add five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. Add just my base wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus six, it would be. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, plus six, so 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 total. You step out and you set it down in the middle of the courtyard. Keyleth, you summon a storm that slowly gathers above the top of the keep. You guys start hearing sounds like rolling thunder outside and you come and look, and you see Percy and Keyleth are out standing in the middle of the courtyard. Keyleth with her arm in the air as this black, dark storm cloud begins to swirl above the entirety of Greyskull Keep. With that, she brings her hand up and then brings her fist down as a bolt of energy (thunder clap) streaks down from the clouds, slamming into a small object on the ground that then gets flung about 15 feet in a random direction. Tumbles to the ground. You rush over to grab it. You can see arcing over the metal. (electric sparking) These small electric arcs. You reach over and wait a second. You prod it. Pick it up and it's hot. Drop it instinctively. You give it a few minutes to cool off. Pick it up when it's warm enough; you put it on and there is essentially this large, sparking, metal centerpiece that is giving off this low hum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it work? Try it on Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sure. Here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Tiberius, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM, ORION
lines.text: No! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you suffer 14 points of lightning damage and are stunned for a round. I need you to go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cock-a-dooed. (yelps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High rolls startle him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay. It stays intact from the force of it. A little bit of the energy that was stored in there appears to dissipate. You figure there's only a few applications of this before it needs to be recharged, and every single time it's utilized, there's a low chance that it may detonate, or crumble, or something bad may happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, that's amazing! What do you call it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (unintelligible mumbling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you all right, Tiberius?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over and give him a Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to eventually shake off all your muscles that were so locked, tense, give way for a second.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's effective.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I call it Diplomacy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Diplomacy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're standing watching that, Trinket comes

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and make an animal handling check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, why didn't I get more points in that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll high. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I say with advantage because Trinket's been your companion for so long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is close to what you needed because this is a very difficult feat. Over the week you've worked with Trinket and you've worked on a technique where, instead of a multi-attack, Trinket can do what is essentially a trample attack, meaning Trinket can roll forward and roll through anything that's equal to or smaller. And damage everything in that path.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Circus bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll go over the logistics of that some other time, but Trinket has now learned a roly-poly trample attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we call it the roly-poly or the cannonball?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's your call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your call. Call it what you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roly-poly is cute; cannonball is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I like cannonball because it's better to shout during the battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Trinket cannonball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roly-poly!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: For brevity, I rolled six dice. I rolled, the only high ones worth mentioning was a 13, a 15, and 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a 15 and an 18--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 17, I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And the, because they're all negative three. And I attempted to teach to Lockheed to hide and speak and to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. To hide and to speak. To stay did not stick, unfortunately. You had two rolls that were high enough to get those two in there though. Hide and speak. All right. The morning has come to fruition. You have a few hours before you're supposed to arrive at the palace. You have been notified that this is a very formal event.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll need fancy robes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we have some formal dresses already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to construct 20 pieces of ammunition from 20 units of materials.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have three fancy robes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, and I've picked up my glaive, right? Two days. It was time to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go back to Karin. You now have some kind of a knife-glaive thing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Krull! I'm naming it Krull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are unsure how it will work in combat? But it looks neat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I attach it to my coat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just hangs to the side. Careful how you sit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I still have the finery I wore to the Velvet Cabaret?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So we have to worry about you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any tapestries or curtains in the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up to the prettiest one and I rip it down, and I throw it over myself like a toga.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) It's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It, in a "Foreigner in a Foreign Land" kind of way, could work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I practice my curtsy. Because I've seen Vex and Keyleth do it, so I think everybody does it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I do it, as well. I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see him roll an athletics check for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you Prestidigitate this thing and make it look like an actual thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not for very long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's more of an illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You pull the hairs out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's wrong with this? I'm from a strange land. My customs are my own.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, have you washed yourself in water at all this week?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's not water, Grog. And I keep casting it on him. It's fine, see. (splash)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It must have been that powder you gave me before. It made me immune.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what it was. You're immune. You're definitely immune to water now. Good job.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What's wrong with what you're wearing now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His toga? He's wearing a toga made out of a tapestry.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, so I'll go and I'll use some of my Dust of Illusion and I'll (pfft) on what he's wearing and shape it into a fancier robe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From a visual standpoint, the robe tapers and curls around his form, and comes to look like a nicer robe. The material looks like it's made of almost a reddish silk. The actual imagery of the tapestry slowly fades and becomes just various textures and material. From your eyes, it's less interesting, but from a presentory standpoint it could be passable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't forget his exotic facial hair, as well. That probably lends to the whole package.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half giant beard and half scrawled-on charcoal.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I notice this, I go: Oh. Oh, Grog. And I use a little bit more of Dust of Illusion. I wipe it. Smear it on there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wipe it away!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to take it, and I'm going to actually put it in your hand and be like-- put it on your thumb and be like: I want you to smear this where the beard was, and I want you to think really hard that you want it there. Okay? So put it on first. There you go. That's it. And now think really hard that you want it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dust tends to glisten, and where there was once charcoal outline, a mirror to your once beautiful beard continues, full, as if nothing had happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I walk over to Vax, and I go, here you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This looks very good. Thank you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're welcome. Would you like some more?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't want to cloud my thinking before we go up against the Briarwoods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably smart. I'll take that back. I crush the goblet in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This creaking metal sound. The goblet is now destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no! What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just there in wait as part of their process today. As soon as you arrive and announce yourselves as having arrived, is there anything you want to do to prepare?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, are you in disguise yet, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I look like Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cloaked Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are nearing the palace right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nearing the palace? Hit me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I produce a few flower cummerbunds and start pinning them on the party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go in and put my arm through Percy's arm to make it seem like we're twins. I go in with Percy to make it look like we're the twinsies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Invisibility on Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hand the Potion of Climbing to Vax and say, don't die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No promises.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got one hour until my Invisibility is going to wear off, so find a shadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys make yourselves known at the palace front?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! We're friends here. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards lead you to the front area of the palace. The sun's just starting to hit the distant side of the water of the Ozmit Sea to the west of Emon. As you guys finish talking to the front guard that you've arrived, Seeker Asum steps out of the front of the palace and sees you. "Very good. Glad you could make it. Please enter. I will "wish to speak with you briefly before the event this evening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you missing anyone?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes. Percy wasn't feeling very well. He ended up staying home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. That's unfortunate. His skills could have been of use to me. Come inside."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pat Vax's hand-- Percy's hand. What the fuck. This is creepy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Call him Vaxy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vaxy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will work just fine. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're not aware, they should be referred to as "Lord and Lady Briarwood. Their names: Lord Sylas Briarwood and Lady Delilah Briarwood."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylas and Delilah? (singing) Hey there, Delilah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is a political dinner. Please do your best not to cause a scene during the meal, as I "need that time as a distraction to do my own digging."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vax."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you wish to join me on this or "stay with the dinner party?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stay with the dinner party. I wish to observe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He also has a bit of a cold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wish to observe the Briarwoods myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gritty voice) I wish to observe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to go more nasal, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, nasal.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, you need to go down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sort of like sandpaper on a chalkboard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have done something about this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum goes, "All right. If we are to do this, I would appreciate a little bit of honesty at the "front point."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I'm Tiberius Stormwind from Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Asum, it's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I gathered as much, as soon as you began to speak. Now, I can understand, based on our "previous conversation, that you have interest in keeping low key, but know that I am an ally in "this. If you're not here, where is the rest of your party. Where is Vax?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax is here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's stealthing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's being quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, Vax, if you can hear me, follow me when the meal begins. I may have use for you. All "right, so. The Briarwoods have a very good relationship with Uriel and the Tal'Dorei council, "established back before they expanded outside of Wildemount. I've sent two of my best gatherers into "Wynandir to seek out more information on them. I don't know when that information will be "available; they've only been gone but three days, and hopefully in time, we'll learn more of what "their machinations may be. Many of the noble houses of Whitestone were left vacant when the de "Rolos passed and were given to friends of the Briarwoods. Whispers that reach me speak of these "new nobles, not being highborn, nor affiliated with the gentry at all, so I'm curious as to what "allies they've made either before or after taking Whitestone for themselves."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are the names of these people who've taken over White--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't. The Briarwoods have."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought they said they had friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm still following the trail but I find the "timing far too convenient. With their arrival coming up, please be controlled, remember what "I've told you and as more information comes in in the passing weeks I'll bring that to your "attention, as well. Be observant, listen, pry what information you can, but do not raise suspicion."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: However, if you need us to act, just utter the word "jenga."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jenga."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also make a matching corsage and pin it on his lapel, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, he looks down at it and goes, "Thank you; it's not my color."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the offer but my theme goes with browns and blacks so as not to be seen. This "is a bit bright for my taste."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might have had a more utilitarian purpose, but it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to be at the dinner, but thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any of your people learning about the Briarwoods? Are they magic users in any way? Have you heard anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The only thing I can recall as the information of the Briarwoods, at least what's "come this way was while they were ruling the lands in Wildemount as part of their kingdom there, Lady "Delilah Briarwood was an accomplished practitioner of the arcane arts, a long-trained wizard as far "as I know and been through quite a few different schools and had a brief stint here in Emon "training at the Lyceum, but that was naught but nine, ten years back? Maybe more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do any of you know, as somebody practiced in the arcane arts, are you good at seeing through illusions? Or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me? Who, us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody that is, you know, very skilled?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So it's tricky, is what I'm saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she wouldn't automatically know. They wouldn't be able to spot immediately that Percy is not actually--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Somebody would have to have rather powerful abilities to see through an illusion spell like a disguise or such. It's like a rakshasa could see though that kind of thing, per experience. I doubt that the Briarwoods have any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you hear, muffled in the distance a (horn noise) this horn sound that seems to be blown as a notification that the arrival of guests has rolled in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you ready for this, Vaxy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Let's do this.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Would you like me to cast Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum goes, "No, please, none of that. Vax, if you can hear me in this room, ten minutes into "the meal see if you can spot me and follow me in the foyer. Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, I hope you phoned ahead and gave them your order for a vegan meal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I always do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's vegan. Of course she told them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly. It's on the RSVP.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum leaves the room. Do you wish to stay inside, do you wish to see the guests as they arrive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go be social.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go mingle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never seen her quite so formal, but very beautiful type thing. She glances over the shoulders, "It's so good to see you. I'm so glad you all could make it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wonderful to see you. I give her a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a little hug, too. Glances over at you. "A pleasure, Vax'ildan."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: See? She can see it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, she can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You look gorgeous Allura, and my friends are just making weird faces right now. It's probably because of how beautiful you look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this discussion about 15 feet from you the Briarwoods enter the palace, their guards enter with them. There's been no pleasantry and very much an intended arrival. None of you are recognizable to them, thus they make no intent of introducing themselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We catch any of their eye at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to be looking about and taking in their surroundings but they're both engaged in a mumbled conversation between the two of them as they enter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anyone waiting to greet them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you follow where they're going, as you walk into the main foyer area where you stand there, waiting carefully at the back, there are a number of servants that have arrived and have taken some of their bags and help them up the stairs. There is one, the head servant who is there talking to them and you hear him speaking to them. "Wait in your quarters be ready, the meal "should be ready within the hour. If you would be so kind as to prepare yourselves, relax, unwind, "set up your rooms. You're to stay for a few days at the very least. But we shall call you when the "meal is ready." At which Lord Sylas Briarwood turns to him and says, "I greatly appreciate the "information. Just come to our room and let us know when the food is ready. Now, come, my dear"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I keep an eye on them as they're walking to their room? Just as long as I can see their mouths moving, I can read their lips.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also want to scan their entourage to see if I recognize any faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, perception check. Perception check for you, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to perceive it? I have a feat that I can read it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I have Observant: Read Lips meaning I can read lips from any language I can understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Okay, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. No, they all appear to be run of the mill soldiers, nothing, no one that catches your attention. The young man who is helping them as they go through seems familiar, but no one that is jumping out at you right now. Someone you may have crossed paths with in the past but nobody that's really been formally involved in your life previously. Maybe a denizen of Whitestone that you've crossed before when he was younger. As they walk up the steps, you keep an eye best you can as they go. You catch a little bit of conversation that seems to speak about how long the journey's been, "That's all right, we'll be in there soon to discuss and we'll be out as soon as we can. We "won't stay any longer than we need to." And that's the extent you gather as they continue up the stairway. As the next hour or so passes?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I flirt with Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do you want to talk with Allura?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I flirt with her throughout the hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She laughs, and she's very attentive to all of you and excited to see you. She lets you know that she's been caught in a little bit of the bureaucracy in the city and despises that. She's taken some time off for herself for about a week or so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, towards the end of that conversation I would like to bring up a specific thing. We've been having such a wonderful conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, no, of course, Tiberius"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think when things settle down a bit, perhaps you and I and maybe Grog, and Lady Kima can perhaps go out. Break bread and have some wine and such on an evening with each other. I believe my friend rather fancies Kima. What say you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's very flattering, Tiberius. I appreciate the invitation. I would say that "particular mix of company might prove a bit awkward."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, of course. If it was awkward, nobody wants that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps we might-- I mean if you would like to get some tea sometime "I'd be more than happy to--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, just you and I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Kima's quite a ways off and I believe she's still in Vasselheim, last I spoke with her, "and yes, tea would be lovely."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, all right, wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You walk away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He got a date!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that carriage. Is the carriage still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The carriage, as far as you see, is being led off slowly by the servants to a side area of the palace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the armed on horseback that were with the Briarwoods when they came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them are with the Briarwoods, and there are two helping to bring their stuff up to their rooms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The four are with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four are with them, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then, as an hour has passed, I beckon to Vax and find a shadowy area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real Vax or Vaxy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Real Vax. Because my thing is wearing off, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been scanning the crowd. Have I noticed anything over the past hour of any of our people? Any locals, any council members, who may be acting a little shifty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking about, the council is roughly stepping in and out of the area like they're getting ready for the dinner and arriving from the Cloudtop district.

lines.name: MARISHA
