lines.text: Any of them breaking a sweat? Acting weird?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I want to check out this, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an insight roll, both of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was previously one of the heads of the guard there within Emon and then was then given the job of being the head of the Watchful Hall. He's the master of law essentially in the city. That's right, Tofor is the master of defense that took over for Krieg after Krieg was slain. So those are the council members. Most everyone else there you see are servants. As time goes on eventually there is the ringing of a dinner bell down the hallway and everyone turns their head and notices and steps over to the great hall of the palace where the feast is to be given to you and other guests.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we move, I release and then recast Invisibility on him when I see that there's a moment where everyone's distracted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so you rejuvenate the Invisibility spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh look, Tiberius, they have bananas!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can sense you, you dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This fireplace is probably a good six feet high and about 12 feet wide. It's a grandiose visual on the far end of this hall, and there's a long table right there set for about 20 people. You don't know if there will be that many there at the table but it can seat that many. At which point, all the different members of the council have their seats around it. You guys find your seats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we get a feel for where the Briarwoods are going to sit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With this many seats set, it's hard to tell, but you gather that they're probably going to sit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there place cards? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no place cards but there are two ends of the table that have two chairs at each end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I position myself when I sit to where I can see them? So I can read their mouths, specifically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. You can probably sit on the center or the far end of the table looking in their direction, should be fine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I sit at the far end of the table at the very opposite end, if not at head of the end--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably where Uriel is going to sit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The king.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Not that chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, but adjacent to it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. That would be rude, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, fair enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume I sit at the kiddie table because I'm so tiny?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've got a booster chair for you, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do have adjustments for gnomish guests-- is a way of putting it. All right, after you guys sit for a few moments, another servant steps forward and says, "Please, if we might rise "for our guests Lord and Lady Briarwood to join us at the table--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am risen already. I'm standing already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks about the table with a smile, shoulder length brown hair and his chin goatee very well crafted into almost a point now. He looks about the table. "Thank you, Lord and Lady Briarwood, "for making the journey across the lands so that we might meet in person, finally. Please, allow me to "introduce our dining party and esteemed council of Tal'Dorei." He goes around the table introducing, "Arbiter Brom Goldhand. He is the master of law of our city, and is responsible for maintaining all "of these grand people of our fair town in the realm of safety and order. We have Lord Riskel "Daxio. He is our head of planning and construction; has overseen many of the expansions "of the city, and is a trusted friend of mine. We have the Arcanist Allura Vysoren: one of my "trusted advisors, one of the greatest arcane minds of all of Tal'Dorei, and the overseer of all "things arcane within our city. We have the Guardian Tofor Brotorus, a fierce warrior and "currently the master of defense in our city and hopefully for a long time to come." Tofor gives a (scoffs) sound and everyone is put off by it, but they're also seemingly used to it. "Arbiter Brom "Goldhand: master of law. My lovely wife, the Empress Salda. We have here within our midst, as "well: Vox Machina, a team of intrepid adventurers who rose up and saved my family's life and very "well the city of Emon and have since proven very useful to our territory. Grog Strongjaw, a goliath "of interesting dress, but strong of heart and blade. We have Vex'halia, half-elven maiden with a "bow as swift as the fastest eagle." Looking next, he says, "We have here Vax'ildan, blades quick and "eyes sharp, not a whisper passes his ear. Ah! There you are! Scanlan Shorthalt, a performer "known far and wide. A wit as clever as you've ever seen. His songs are whispered through taverns "across the land. We have Tiberius Stormwind--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm from Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hailing from Draconia, which," he looks across to the Briarwoods, "the kingdom you hail "from originally not being far off from Draconia, perhaps you've had some "dealings with the Stormwinds?" And the Briarwoods give a nod. "Yes, we have seen them in the past. We've heard many good things."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have over here, Keyleth of the Ashari, if I am correct on that? She is a denizen of the "natural lands and protector of all things nature within Tal'Dorei."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There was one more."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two, and they could not be in attendance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, ill.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: They were running around. They got diarrhea. Isn't that what you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately conversation builds in about Uriel talking across to the Briarwoods talking about the bridge. He says "Now, the Uriel bridge, I don't think the name was necessary, but it's appreciated "from my perspective. Now in this union between Wildemount and Tal'Dorei-- do we have a confirmed "trade route between the two?" At which Lord Briarwood returns, "This is indeed very true. We are hoping that through this "passageway, we'd have means of rather quick trade between this kingdom and yours. Not to mention "this would allow for individuals to travel for carried parcels very quickly and we're hoping to "establish perhaps a very quick means of communication outside of the arcane for those who "cannot afford these various luxuries." Lady Briarwood taps on his shoulder and says, "Yes, and by the way, I don't mean to bring up a sore "subject but it's come to our attention that apparently last Winter's Crest, there was an "attempt on your life," and the table gets a little quiet for a second. "We're sorry to hear that and "wish to express our--" Uriel puts his hand out and says, "No, no, it's quite all right. It was but a paltry attempt, and "it was thwarted actually by Vox Machina. They have been tremendous in keeping us safe and I greatly "appreciate their aid in overseeing my family's good fortune." Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While all this is going on, can you describe. Are the Briarwood couple together, seated next to each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are seated right next to each other at the head of one table across the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I intend to be behind them, but what's behind them, like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's behind them is just open space and servants. There's probably a good 25 servants here that are just like sitting there patiently, lying in wait for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And behind the servants is a wall so there's lots of open busy crowded space? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four other ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to drink the potion of climbing that Grog gave me, and I'm spidering up the wall and I'd love, while listening to all this to make an insight check on them just as they talk, just for funsies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To inquire about--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to see if they seem like sacks of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Luck, oh not that lucky. This is going to be very low. Yeah, never mind, low. Very low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell from this distance really at all. They're very charming. You were expecting this very dour, dark, evil couple from all the conversation, but they seem nice. They seem earnest. They keep to themselves definitely, they're definitely a very tight couple but nothing about them catches you off guard as being anything instinctively twisted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very hard to read them upside-down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I inquire to Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so sorry, what was your name again?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You as well. I notice your dress is quite lovely. It doesn't look like a fashion that I'm used to seeing. Where do you hail from originally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We hail from Wildemount. It's quite a ways from here. The continent to the far east."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really, I'm not familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You should come by sometime. We haven't been home in a number of years, having to tend to "Whitestone, but we have quite an elaborate homestead there. We'd love to have you come stay "with us if you ever find yourself in that side of the world."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love to visit. How long have you been at Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been at Whitestone for the better part of-- I can't even remember." And Lord Briarwood looks, he goes, "Best I can recall, four or five years. It was an unfortunate "mantle to pick up but we've done what we can in honor of the passed de Rolo family."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was just going to ask, you seem such a lovely couple. Do you have any children?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We unfortunately do not. It seems it was not in the cards for us to bear. However, we "consider many of our esteemed servants and house guests our extended family. So we can leave a "legacy, however we can possibly do so."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we insight check as, what they're saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I know they're lying out their asses. Fuck. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Seems pretty earnest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lord Briarwood. Down here, hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I--" he snaps and a servant moves a large like pig platter out of the way that was blocking your head from his vision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can move that over here actually, thank you. (chomping noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lord Briarwood, we may share a mutual friend or acquaintance of some sort. My father was a prominent doctor, and he may have studied medicine with a fellow that you know named Dr. Ripulah, Ripley? Dr. Ripley? Do you know such a person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, actually. Dr. Ripley is one of our esteemed physicians in Whitestone. Yes, recently "come into some land herself, although she has been on holiday for some time. Following her own "research as doctors are wont to do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you close with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wouldn't say close, but she's been a friend at times, and she was one of the few that "came with us from Wildemount over to Whitestone and has helped us restructure and maintain and help "facilitate the blossoming of a city without a leader."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She sounds wonderful. Well, when you see her next tell her that my father, Dr. Jeff Shorthalt, said hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jeff Shorthalt, I will be happy to pass that along."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did you become caretaker of such a place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently, they had not traveled and they brought their family with them, a whole gaggle of small "children. They were coming this direction. Now our homestead is on the western outskirts of Wildemount "so one of the first places you traverse before going into the kingdom proper. However, the "family, the de Rolo family had been caught in a bad downpour, a storm that had blown in and made "travel rather impossible, and apparently they stopped not far from our homestead. They came to "our front door asking for shelter for the evening, and we were happy to house them. We gave them dry "clothes, food for the night, and well, a rather fast friendship was forged. As we quickly began to "notice they weren't just rabble of the street, they themselves were highborn as we were and in a "very dire circumstance. So we let them in, they stayed for but a week. We showed them about the "western side of Wildemount and let them on their way. And since then we've had many different years "we've spent together as families going on various journeys and trips together. But as time went on "we got busy on our own and separate ways and we hadn't spoken in a while. They were in the process "of discussing the building of the Uriel bridge about five years ago, and we were going to meet "with them about pursuing this venture as a joint-- well, when the disease took them. The family "passed on. We were surprised that they would've considered leaving Whitestone in our name, and we "couldn't say no, at this point. To carry on their legacy, I felt, was important enough let alone the "memory of that to carry on the building of this Uriel bridge. I thought I really wanted to "spearhead the wishes of Frederick."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That is so courageous of you. Do you want me to Fireball her now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A toast, then!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A toast."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To gracious hosts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To gracious hosts."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: L'Chaim.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Gesundheit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are currently in peacetime and we have a reserve of soldiers we can send your way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we're also free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the meal continues on, more conversations arise. A lot of bureaucratic BS. Anyone want to interject anything or ask any questions?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is Allura there, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura is there, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As we're eating I'm going to: By the way, did you ever perhaps finish making that extra earring I gave you several weeks ago? I don't know how long it's been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura looks, glances over to the side and says, "Yes, it's been completed. No one's come by "to take it from me"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I had no idea, I'll send someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And as a note, I'm about a month away from completing the sigil in the base mentof your keep."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, wonderful. Thank you, that's-- so talented. What flavor tea do you like, Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I prefer a mint or jasmine, to be honest."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Noted. I walk away

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step up and walk away from the dinner table. (chair scraping) Tiberius stands up in the middle of the discussion and walks away from the feast

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Briarwood, it is such an act of compassion to take on such responsibility as a house such as Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiberius, get back here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You said walk away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Not every time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you. This is the first time we've been away from Whitestone in many years."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's such a spectacular act of kindness and generosity. Would, perhaps, Vox Machina also be of service to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps, you seem strong of build and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are handier than we look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We killed a beholder once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just right out with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is an impressive feat, young Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should just lead with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we killed an illithid once, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Slain a beholder? Uriel, you keep in the presence of some mighty heroes." Uriel goes, (chuckles) "They are proven allies. I mean, if you utilize their assistance. That would "be very possible. May have something coming up that I could use them for myself, but we'll "discuss in time. Nevertheless, the meal continues." She smiles and looks back at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check to see if that look at Percy-not-Percy was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an insight check, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you? Can you make an insight check? I don't think you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She looked interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're distracted by the pattern, the brocade across her torso area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, you could roll lower if you tried.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I want to do an arcana check on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you checking for?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If they're armed with anything that has arcane properties.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are adorned in various protective magic, but so is everybody else at the table.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Got you. Standard gear.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: Vax, we also killed an illithid, if I recall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we did. Did we befriend an illithid or kill it? I think we did both.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We befriended it, it betrayed us, and then we killed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was the disease that they had?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and give a sorrowful look. "We do not know. We were only given the "information that the family had passed, but a month or two after it had already occurred."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The entire family. All of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of the castle seemed to have fallen to it, as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So dreadful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel says, "My condolences, by the way. I understand that's very hard." "It's all right. The least we could do is try to carry on their legacy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know how hard it is to lose someone very close to you. I'm sorry for your loss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's appreciated." He looks at his wife, and she looks up for a second. "It's all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm just a little confused. If the whole family died of disease, weren't you afraid to go into this town, into this castle? Weren't you afraid of contracting this disease yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a period of time that we were worried, "but after a few months, we came to the conclusion that we were safe, and thus we moved our way in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucky for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone care for some games of jenga?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's delicious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they whispering to themselves, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of the discussions, there are a few side exchanges here and there. The best you can make from it is, "Did you notice him?" She says, "Yes, don't worry." And, "Tonight, we'll stay." And those are the only things you can make out from the exchanges back and forth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long do you plan on staying here, Lord and Lady?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's too hard to be away, and our nephew has been left in charge of this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have plans on the morrow? I would love to give you a tour of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be lovely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful! Should I send word? How should we arrange this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you staying?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are outside of town at our own keep, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's it called?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Greyskull Keep. We will have you sent for when the time is right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. That will be so fun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vex is so into showing people our city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perhaps you can show me some more of your fashions. I love your dress so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you need to see is the Wildemount fashion "district. It is divine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds wonderful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Vax and I go, does anyone want any dessert?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (gulping) I'm having a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax? You looked at Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Vaxy. The one that I can look at.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you want dessert now? Would you like this fireball creme brulee?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispered) I don't know what to do now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night to you all."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you should Hunter's Mark them or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no, that's Uriel that's leaving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the gentleman who realized that I was there? Earlier, before we came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum? He's not in the room. He's been waiting in the foyer for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was telling you to meet him in the foyer, a long time ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) You should go spy on their room. Go check out that room. I'll distract them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) Go see if he's still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lord and Lady Briarwood also stand up. "On that note as well, I think our meal has come to an "end. We appreciate your--" and Lady Briarwood continues the sentence, "and we wish you all a fine night--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm clicking my Boots of Haste and scuttling along the ceiling back towards the door.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know a particular spell that it's rather wonderful. And I go blow a stream out and do a cantrip, Control Magic, and start doing a nice dragon fire dance that I know of from my home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I play a little flute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both sit and watch for a moment--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Star Wars Cantina song)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I finding what's-his-face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see him anywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm doubling back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you double back. After about a minute of this, "Yes, well, thank you kindly for that "wondrous display. I feel that sleep takes us, and we are going to retire to our quarters. Have a "wonderful night, everyone."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you staying within the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Fantastic.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Have a wonderful rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And good night." And they both stand up, and then they make their way out, through the main great hall exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same guards that led them inside the building, and were riding on horseback.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I Hunter's Mark him before they go in their bedroom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean they're walking away, when their back is turned, could I do it when they're not paying attention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, make a stealth check. Trying to do this subtly at the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20! (cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Hunter's Mark which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lord-- no--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sylas or Delilah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Delilah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you mark Delilah as she walks off. You have a sense of where she is at all times in the vicinity. As you follow them, they go to the door, the guards open the door for them, and lead them into their room, and then close the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that fast? All right. How close to the door are the guards? Right up against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not against it, but immediately to the right and left of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what else to do, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Burn their room down. We've got to find Seeker Assam, or whatever his name is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I yank off my serpent belt and throw it as far as I can. Not as far as I can. 20 feet, and set it in motion, so there's now a snake in the hall, 20 feet in front of these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take it, and you throw the snake. Let me check one thing on Invisibility real fast. Just because--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, just, snake flies down the hall--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If he does an action, it dissipates the spell. It's not Greater Invisibility, so he goes uninvisible, when he does something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over at the other guard, he pulls out his weapon and one of the guards steps over to where the serpent is and starts trying to stomp it out, and it nips up and gets some of the armor, and he's just, stomping out the snake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So one's 20 feet away now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 25 feet away, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 feet away, and one guy stayed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drop, and I'm going to bean him on the head, like his name is Kynan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. "Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in combat yet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he is surprised, because he does not know you're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm invisible, so that's an 18. That is 29 to hit. Using the blunt end! I just want to knock him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, okay. Go ahead and roll sneak attack damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doubled. 12, 17, 23, 24, 26, so 52. Plus-- No, I mean, if I am as skilled a rogue as I am, how could I not just want to knock somebody out, and not unintentionally-- ten. On top of the 52.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just falls like a sack of potatoes right against the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hand on the door. Is it locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is currently not locked. You can see the guard you just knocked out, had the key in his hand and was in the process of going to lock the door right when that happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I flip my hood over my head, and I quietly go in the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, you're not invisible anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One's clean, one has actual decor on it. There are two wooden tables immediately to the right and left of you. There's a large red rug, central to the floor, that is circular, and on the far corners next to the two windows you see armoires, like dressers, for clothing and such. In the center of the room, you see, on top of the rug, against the wall between the two windows is a large canopy bed, very beautifully carved from dark wood, has a purple cloth silk canopy that drifts down around it. And on the far end, you can see now, against one of the tables, is Lady Briarwood is currently taking jewelry off of one of her arms while Lord Briarwood is right by the bed, holding on to the post, like he's just walked over to that area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're both at the bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both at the bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 25 for stealth and it didn't work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both looking in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Oh, sorry. Sorry, I heard a noise in here. I work for the city. I apologize. That was really stupid. As you were. I walk out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my last Luck of the day. Didn't do it; same thing. Nine, 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lord Briarwood goes, "Oh, well, that's all right. Not to worry, in no serious rush. Isn't "that right, my dear?" And she looks over, she stops taking her jewelry off and turns. "Yes, yes, of course. As you, a man "who works for the city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes ma'am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you do for the city, if I may ask?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm a guard. I mean, there's not really a name for what I do. I work for Uriel, I just-- I'm security, ma'am, and I thought I heard a noise in here. And I heard a body fall, I thought-- sounded like a body fell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both step a little bit closer. Looking at you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm backing up as I'm talking, I'm right at the door! I didn't shut it behind me, I just cracked it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Lady Briarwood goes, "You look strangely similar to a gentleman we just had "dinner with."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's uncanny how similar you look."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (arcane chanting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to make a wisdom save, is what you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jenga!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not good. It's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn to move and your muscles (crunching) tense up, as you're unable to physically move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is awkward, ma'am, I'm just trying to do my job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jenga! We had a safe word for a reason!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hashtag Save Vax!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dude, I think they're into some weird shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How you doing, Taliesin?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yells and groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so evil!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're creeping me out, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're making it so much worse than I ever imagined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're totally vampires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we're going to have to rescue Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I swear if the Briarwoods are responsible for a party kill, I'm going to feel like such an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That'd be rough. Well, cool. We'll all be picking up that next week on Thursday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, please, like you haven't rushed into a situation before, Orion?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No! I never have. I can actually say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like attacking an inanimate door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Or, or launching a Fireball in the middle of a wood house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to convince an entire army of illithid to follow you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Rushing off to Draconia to buy a Bag of Holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just today, running off to the, to the sigil!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Never put myself in danger except for the illithid. Never put myself in danger. The fire thing. Now granted, I didn't know how Fireball worked at the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry you're such a nervous fellow!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm just saying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hey, what's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, how am I going to play my second character unless I die now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you could become a vampire! You can be a vampire half-elf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and rock through those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I regret nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you shouldn't! That got really interesting really fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [end of transcription]
